```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(DT)
```

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Data -------------------------------------------------------------------------
author = c("Sears, Clara G. et al.",
           "Yeh, Tian-Shin et al.",
           "McPhail, Sean et al.",
           "Stevenson, Richard J. et al.") # add authors

year = c(2022,
         2022,
         2022, 
         2020) # add year of publication

title = c("Urinary Cadmium and Incident Heart Failure: A Case-Cohort Analysis Among Never-Smokers in Denmark",
          "Longâ€‘term intake of total energy and fat in relation to subjective cognitive decline",
          "Risk factors and prognostic implications of diagnosis of cancer within 30 days after an emergency hospital admission (emergency presentation): an International Cancer Benchmarking Partnership (ICBP) population-based study",
          "Hippocampal-dependent appetitive control is impaired by experimental exposure to a Western-style diet") # add title of publication

journal = c("Epidemiology",
            "European Journal of Epidemiology",
            "The Lancet Oncology",
            "Royal Society Open Science") # add journal

discussed = as.Date(c("2022-03-16",
                      "2022-04-20",
                      "2022-05-18",
                      "2022-06-15")) # add date article was discussed

# Create data frame
dat = data.frame(author, year, title, journal, discussed)

# Create table -----------------------------------------------------------------
DT::datatable(
  dat,
  colnames=c("Author", 
             "Year",
             "Title",
             "Journal",
             "Discussed on:"),
  rownames = FALSE,
  fillContainer = FALSE,
  options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
```
